trans-unit.source: Delete Service Certificate
trans-unit.target: Delete Service Certificate

trans-unit.source: The <languageKeyword>Delete Service Certificate</languageKeyword> asynchronous operation deletes a service certificate from the certificate store of a cloud service.
trans-unit.target: The <languageKeyword>Delete Service Certificate</languageKeyword> asynchronous operation deletes a service certificate from the certificate store of a cloud service.

trans-unit.source: Request
trans-unit.target: Request

trans-unit.source: The <languageKeyword>Delete Service Certificate</languageKeyword> request may be specified as follows.
trans-unit.target: The <languageKeyword>Delete Service Certificate</languageKeyword> request may be specified as follows.

trans-unit.source: Replace <codeInline>%%amp;lt;subscription-id%%amp;gt;</codeInline> with the subscription ID, <codeInline>%%amp;lt;service-name%%amp;gt;</codeInline> with the DNS prefix name of the cloud service, <codeInline>%%amp;lt;thumbprint-algorithm%%amp;gt;</codeInline> with the algorithm for the thumbprint, and <codeInline>%%amp;lt;thumbprint%%amp;gt;</codeInline> with the thumbprint.
trans-unit.target: Replace <codeInline>%%amp;lt;subscription-id%%amp;gt;</codeInline> with the subscription ID, <codeInline>%%amp;lt;service-name%%amp;gt;</codeInline> with the DNS prefix name of the cloud service, <codeInline>%%amp;lt;thumbprint-algorithm%%amp;gt;</codeInline> with the algorithm for the thumbprint, and <codeInline>%%amp;lt;thumbprint%%amp;gt;</codeInline> with the thumbprint.

trans-unit.source: Method
trans-unit.target: Method

trans-unit.source: Request URI
trans-unit.target: Request URI

trans-unit.source: DELETE
trans-unit.target: DELETE

trans-unit.source: You must make sure that the request that is made to the management service is secure.
trans-unit.target: You must make sure that the request that is made to the management service is secure.

trans-unit.source: For additional details, see <link xlink:href="1becb7dc-1cdc-4db4-8ae8-7e351c96c251" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Authenticating Service Management Requests</link>.
trans-unit.target: For additional details, see <link xlink:href="1becb7dc-1cdc-4db4-8ae8-7e351c96c251" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Authenticating Service Management Requests</link>.

trans-unit.source: URI Parameters
trans-unit.target: URI Parameters

trans-unit.source: None.
trans-unit.target: None.

trans-unit.source: Request Headers
trans-unit.target: Request Headers

trans-unit.source: The following table describes the request headers.
trans-unit.target: The following table describes the request headers.

trans-unit.source: Request Header
trans-unit.target: Request Header

trans-unit.source: Description
trans-unit.target: Description

trans-unit.source: Required.
trans-unit.target: Required.

trans-unit.source: Specifies the version of the operation to use for this request.
trans-unit.target: Specifies the version of the operation to use for this request.

trans-unit.source: This header should be set to <userInput>2009-10-01</userInput> or higher.
trans-unit.target: This header should be set to <userInput>2009-10-01</userInput> or higher.

trans-unit.source: For more information about versioning headers, see <link xlink:href="bb009293-529c-4793-b925-0f8701f337d2" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Service Management Versioning</link>.
trans-unit.target: For more information about versioning headers, see <link xlink:href="bb009293-529c-4793-b925-0f8701f337d2" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Service Management Versioning</link>.

trans-unit.source: Request Body
trans-unit.target: Request Body

trans-unit.source: None.
trans-unit.target: None.

trans-unit.source: Response
trans-unit.target: Response

trans-unit.source: The response includes an HTTP status code and a set of response headers.
trans-unit.target: The response includes an HTTP status code and a set of response headers.

trans-unit.source: Status Code
trans-unit.target: Status Code

trans-unit.source: A successful operation returns status code 200 (OK).
trans-unit.target: A successful operation returns status code 200 (OK).

trans-unit.source: For information about status codes, see <link xlink:href="10f8d244-4649-4063-b6c9-7a20765513fa" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Status and Error Codes</link>.
trans-unit.target: For information about status codes, see <link xlink:href="10f8d244-4649-4063-b6c9-7a20765513fa" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Status and Error Codes</link>.

trans-unit.source: Response Headers
trans-unit.target: Response Headers

trans-unit.source: The response for this operation includes the following headers.
trans-unit.target: The response for this operation includes the following headers.

trans-unit.source: The response may also include additional standard HTTP headers.
trans-unit.target: The response may also include additional standard HTTP headers.

trans-unit.source: All standard headers comply with the <externalLink><linkText>HTTP/1.1 protocol specification</linkText><linkUri>http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=150478</linkUri></externalLink>.
trans-unit.target: All standard headers comply with the <externalLink><linkText>HTTP/1.1 protocol specification</linkText><linkUri>http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=150478</linkUri></externalLink>.

trans-unit.source: Response Header
trans-unit.target: Response Header

trans-unit.source: Description
trans-unit.target: Description

trans-unit.source: A value that uniquely identifies a request made against the management service.
trans-unit.target: A value that uniquely identifies a request made against the management service.

trans-unit.source: For an asynchronous operation, you can call <link xlink:href="1215ece5-cbef-4a85-a3db-ab6c20c2c6df" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Get Operation Status</link> with the value of the header to determine whether the operation is complete, has failed, or is still in progress.
trans-unit.target: For an asynchronous operation, you can call <link xlink:href="1215ece5-cbef-4a85-a3db-ab6c20c2c6df" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Get Operation Status</link> with the value of the header to determine whether the operation is complete, has failed, or is still in progress.

trans-unit.source: Response Body
trans-unit.target: Response Body

trans-unit.source: None.
trans-unit.target: None.

trans-unit.source: Example
trans-unit.target: Example

trans-unit.source: The following example is a console program that adds a pfx certificate to a specified cloud service, and then deletes the certificate from the cloud service.
trans-unit.target: The following example is a console program that adds a pfx certificate to a specified cloud service, and then deletes the certificate from the cloud service.

trans-unit.source: To run the example, create a service certificate and save it with its private key as a pfx file in your Documents folder.
trans-unit.target: To run the example, create a service certificate and save it with its private key as a pfx file in your Documents folder.

trans-unit.source: When you create the service certificate as a pfx file, give it a password that you will enter later to add the certificate to your cloud service.
trans-unit.target: When you create the service certificate as a pfx file, give it a password that you will enter later to add the certificate to your cloud service.

trans-unit.source: Modify the code to update the <codeInline>Version</codeInline> string with the desired value to use in the <parameterReference>x-ms-version</parameterReference> header.
trans-unit.target: Modify the code to update the <codeInline>Version</codeInline> string with the desired value to use in the <parameterReference>x-ms-version</parameterReference> header.

trans-unit.source: Set the <codeInline>ManagementThumbprint</codeInline> value to the thumbprint of your management certificate.
trans-unit.target: Set the <codeInline>ManagementThumbprint</codeInline> value to the thumbprint of your management certificate.

trans-unit.source: Set the <codeInline>SubscriptionId</codeInline> value to the subscription identifier, and set the <codeInline>ServiceName</codeInline> to the DNS prefix name of your hosted service.
trans-unit.target: Set the <codeInline>SubscriptionId</codeInline> value to the subscription identifier, and set the <codeInline>ServiceName</codeInline> to the DNS prefix name of your hosted service.

trans-unit.source: Set the <codeInline>PfxFile</codeInline> value to the name of the service certificate pfx file, and set the <codeInline>CertificateThumbprint</codeInline> value to the thumbprint of the certificate.
trans-unit.target: Set the <codeInline>PfxFile</codeInline> value to the name of the service certificate pfx file, and set the <codeInline>CertificateThumbprint</codeInline> value to the thumbprint of the certificate.

trans-unit.source: When the program runs, it requests the password for the service certificate pfx file.
trans-unit.target: When the program runs, it requests the password for the service certificate pfx file.

trans-unit.source: Then it uses the <link xlink:href="eb4313c8-19b7-4966-912b-eced07a0e36e" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Add Service Certificate</link> operation to add the certificate to the cloud service, and polls for the asynchronous result using the <link xlink:href="1215ece5-cbef-4a85-a3db-ab6c20c2c6df" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Get Operation Status</link> operation.
trans-unit.target: Then it uses the <link xlink:href="eb4313c8-19b7-4966-912b-eced07a0e36e" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Add Service Certificate</link> operation to add the certificate to the cloud service, and polls for the asynchronous result using the <link xlink:href="1215ece5-cbef-4a85-a3db-ab6c20c2c6df" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Get Operation Status</link> operation.

trans-unit.source: When the result is available, the program uses the <link xlink:href="6bcded9f-519f-4e41-8833-e4658ae4cb98" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">List Service Certificates</link> operation to display the certificates in the cloud service.
trans-unit.target: When the result is available, the program uses the <link xlink:href="6bcded9f-519f-4e41-8833-e4658ae4cb98" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">List Service Certificates</link> operation to display the certificates in the cloud service.

trans-unit.source: Then it uses the <languageKeyword>Delete Service Certificate</languageKeyword> operation to delete the certificate from the cloud service, and polls for the asynchronous result using the <link xlink:href="1215ece5-cbef-4a85-a3db-ab6c20c2c6df" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Get Operation Status</link> operation.
trans-unit.target: Then it uses the <languageKeyword>Delete Service Certificate</languageKeyword> operation to delete the certificate from the cloud service, and polls for the asynchronous result using the <link xlink:href="1215ece5-cbef-4a85-a3db-ab6c20c2c6df" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Get Operation Status</link> operation.

trans-unit.source: Finally, it uses the <link xlink:href="6bcded9f-519f-4e41-8833-e4658ae4cb98" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">List Service Certificates</link> operation to show that the certificate has been removed.
trans-unit.target: Finally, it uses the <link xlink:href="6bcded9f-519f-4e41-8833-e4658ae4cb98" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">List Service Certificates</link> operation to show that the certificate has been removed.

trans-unit.source: See <legacyLink xlink:href="45a51506-230b-43a3-add9-ab83abc835b9" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Create a Service Certificate for Azure</legacyLink> for more information about how to create a certificate, export it as a .pfx file, and obtain its thumbprint.
trans-unit.target: See <legacyLink xlink:href="45a51506-230b-43a3-add9-ab83abc835b9" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Create a Service Certificate for Azure</legacyLink> for more information about how to create a certificate, export it as a .pfx file, and obtain its thumbprint.

trans-unit.source: The following example output shows the certificate added to the cloud service, and then shows that the cloud service has no certificates after the certificate is deleted:
trans-unit.target: The following example output shows the certificate added to the cloud service, and then shows that the cloud service has no certificates after the certificate is deleted:
